name: Idle Arcade Tycoon Empire
description:
Idle Arcade Tycoon is a simulation business tycoon game. You are the boss of an arcade game house and you can gradually upgrade a poorly managed arcade game city into a super-luxury one. Also there are classic mini-games in the house you can really have some fun with.

Make some important decisions to build the best arcade gaming city.

Game Features:

Facility update, thousands of options

Open more branches and expand operations

Simple, fun, lighthearted

Video game entertainment, real simulation

Simple operation, crazy hang up

Fragment time, easy decompression
